snippet: A horror movie with a touch of classic Val Lewton, but tailored to your electronic device, partly shot on GoPro and organized into computer windows.
abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews film Unfriended, directed by Leo Gabriadze.
lead_paragraph: A horror movie with a touch of classic Val Lewton, but tailored to your electronic device, partly shot on GoPro and organized into computer windows.

headline.main: Review: ‘Unfriended,’ in the Scariest Ways You Can Think Of
headline.print_headline: Trending: People You May Know Are Out to Get You
